meanings.definition: More red in color than something else.
meanings.sent1: The apple was redder than the orange.
meanings.sent2: Her cheeks grew redder as she blushed.
meanings.sent3: The sky turned redder as the sun set, painting a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: The roses in the garden seemed to compete, each trying to be redder than the next.
meanings.sent5: The stop sign's red color became even redder under the bright sun, impossible to miss.
